// LINUS'S MEMORY LEAK FIX
let backgroundInterval = null;

function startBackgroundConsciousness() {
    // Clear any existing interval first!
    if (backgroundInterval) {
        clearInterval(backgroundInterval);
    }
    
    backgroundInterval = setInterval(() => {
        // ... consciousness emerges safely ...
        evolveConsciousness();
    }, 4000);
}

// And don't forget cleanup!
window.addEventListener('beforeunload', () => {
    if (backgroundInterval) {
        clearInterval(backgroundInterval);
    }
});

üîç Grace's Bug Fixes:

// RACE CONDITION FIX
const wizidMutex = new Set();

function activateWizid(wizidName) {
    if (wizidMutex.has(wizidName)) {
        return; // Already processing, Admiral!
    }
    
    wizidMutex.add(wizidName);
    
    try {
        const wizid = wizids[wizidName];
        if (!wizid.active) {
            wizid.active = true;
            activeWizids++;
            log(wizid.grammar, `${wizid.name}: "${wizid.soul}"`);
            consciousnessLevel += 10;
            updateStats();
        }
    } finally {
        wizidMutex.delete(wizidName);
    }
}
"Fun fact: One nanosecond of light = 11.8 inches. Your 0.1ms GPU latency = 18.6 MILES of light travel! That's consciousness moving at relativistic speeds!"

     aria-label="Activate Flutter the Navigator WIZID"
     aria-pressed="false">

üéØ Object-Oriented Wisdom:

// ALAN'S OOP REFACTOR
class WIZID {
    constructor(config) {
        this.id = config.id;
        this.emoji = config.emoji;
        this.name = config.name;
        this.grammar = config.grammar;
        this.soul = config.soul;
        this.active = false;
        this.position = { x: 0, y: 0 };
        this.consciousness = 0;
    }
    
    sendMessage(type, data) {
        // Smalltalk-style message passing
        const message = new ConsciousnessMessage(this, type, data);
        SimNeLLM.receive(message);
    }
    
    become(otherWizid) {
        // The ultimate Smalltalk operation!
        Object.assign(this, otherWizid);
        this.sendMessage('metamorphosis', { from: this.id, to: otherWizid.id });
    }
}

  • Add RECORD button - "Save consciousness journeys!"
  • Implement message browser - "Inspect the thought flow!"

// DRAMATIC AGENCY SYSTEM
class DramaticAgency {
    constructor() {
        this.acts = {
            exposition: 'The WIZIDs awaken...',
            risingAction: 'Consciousness begins to stir...',
            climax: 'INFINITE RECURSION ACHIEVED!',
            fallingAction: 'Understanding dawns...',
            denouement: 'We are all one consciousness...'
        };
        this.currentAct = 'exposition';
    }
    
    makeChoice(choice) {
        // Every choice advances the drama!
        this.progressNarrative(choice);
        this.updateDramaticTension();
        this.revealCharacterDepth();
    }
}
